sentences.en: Extension credibility is closely tied to the acquisition by its personnel of new knowledge.
sentences.cn: 推广的可靠性与人们对新知识的探求密切相关.

sentences.en: From her wardrobe Laura took her latest acquisition, a bright red dress.
sentences.cn: 劳拉从衣柜里拿出了她最近的购物战果，一件鲜红色连衣裙。

sentences.en: He is a valuable acquisition to our firm.
sentences.cn: 他是我们公司新来的得力雇员.

sentences.en: How did you go about making this marvellous acquisition then?
sentences.cn: 那么你是怎么买到这一绝品的？

sentences.en: Original acquisition comprises making things , taking possession of ownerless things.
sentences.cn: 原始取得包括造物, 占有无主物.

sentences.en: The acquisition of two to the number of inhabitants in London was something.
sentences.cn: 能在伦敦居民的数字上加上两个,是了不起的事情.

sentences.en: The children progressed in the acquisition of basic skills.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在掌握基本技术方面取得了进步.

sentences.en: The high - speed and memory data acquisition card is selected.
sentences.cn: 选择了 高速 大容量数据采集卡.

sentences.en: The major Methods: Used to reconstitute the company are acquisition of companies and merging.
sentences.cn: 公司重组的方式有公司收购和公司兼并.

sentences.en: The school has a valuable new acquisition ( ie a valuable new teacher ) in Mr Smith.
sentences.cn: 学校里来了个生力军 ( 很好的新教师 ) 史密斯先生.

sentences.en: The system realizes real - time acquisition and display for video image.
sentences.cn: 该系统实现了视频图像的 实时 采集和显示.

sentences.en: This dress is Amy's new acquisition.
sentences.cn: 这衣服是艾米新添置的.

sentences.en: This motor - scooter is my latest acquisition.
sentences.cn: 这辆摩托车是我最新购置的.

sentences.en: Vegetative plant growth could be driven by resource acquisition or developmental programs.
sentences.cn: 营养的获取或发育程序可驱动植物的营养生长.

words.tran_cn: 贪得的；想获得的；可学到的；有获得可能性的

phrases.tran_cn: 数据采集系统；资料获取系统
知识获取；知识习得；知识获得；知识采集

trans.tran_cn: 收购，获得，购得物，（知识等的）习得
trans.tran_en: the process by which you gain knowledge or learn a skill
